title: So when is Pantheon's visual update gonna happen?

replies.body: I wonder how true they are going to stay to his current design once his VGU rolls around. I like the idea of making him less of a 'generic Spartan', but am also attached to his cool helmet and how it obscures the rest of his face.

When he gets his VGU. But there are a few champs who are likely to get one before his turn. Namely Urgot, Eve, Swain, Morde & Galio who is already in the process of being updated. 
Nunu, Cho'gath, Akali, Irelia & Shaco can possibly get one before him too, it just depends on a number of factors (these champs are around the same level of Pantheon)

I understand Eve and Morde but Galio seems like someone who'll get an entire update, not just a visual one, and if that takes too long he seems like someone who's just gonna get a re-texture. That's the case with Cho'Gath and Shaco.

Nunu though I do understand, not sure about Akali, she seems pretty good and Irelia? Yeah okay.

Wait wha-? Buddy, the 2nd VGU team got to work on Galio when they finished Yorick, which was in September. Remember, Riot has 2 VGU teams. Galio is getting the full update and Riot has been working on it for months & it should be out in a month or 2.
Yeah, thought so, you're practically agreeing with me
Then why the freak are you talking about a re-texture? Like, where did that come from?

A full complete VGU, but if not anytime soon than first he'll get a retexture before that. Read what I said again.
I clearly said an entire update and if it takes too long, a retexture just to fill in that gap of time. 

ya nutcase

He is by FAR my most anticipated VGU

My guess is the next two are{{champion:6}} and {{champion:28}}, but I am secretly hoping by some miracle {{champion:80}} is one of them
My next year wish list is {{champion:80}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:25}}
My biggest problem out of the three would be Kayle, and not her model, her splash art. Her old splash art was beyond amazing and Riot had to screw that up >__>

Her new one is amazing though but I doesn't seem like a League art. It would be good if it was a skin art. Base splash tend to have a different feel that scream league, her current on is a bit too different.
Her old one was gold, it shouted out 'divine' but the new one seems 'tattered'

He won't get a visual update he's getting a full rework. 

I'm kind of terrified about that.
Do you mind sending me the riot post! I really want to see the upcomming champion reworks!
Oh ja does everyone see Pantheon's FEET? And Jax's HANDS.

A few more will probably come out first - {{champion:28}} {{champion:6}} for sure.
